LightningComponentBundle.description: Improving the standard File Upload component.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Related Record Id
property.description: The record Id of the record that the uploaded file is associated to.

property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: The text on the file upload button.

property.name: acceptedFormats
property.label: Accepted Formats
property.description: The accepted file types. Enter a comma-separated string of the file extensions (such as '.txt, .jpg') that the user can upload.

property.name: allowMultiple
property.label: Allow Multiple Files
property.description: Allow the user to upload multiple files. If this is not TRUE, then once the user uploads one file, the file upload component will not allow any additional files to be uploaded.

property.name: disabled
property.label: Disabled
property.description: Displays the component in a disabled state.

property.name: required
property.label: Required
property.description: Require the user to upload at least one file.

property.name: requiredMessage
property.label: Required Validation Message
property.description: The validation message displayed if the user has not uploaded at least one file. The default message is 'Upload at least one file.'
